markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potion of Expeditious Retreat](/Equipment.aspx?ID=720)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 258 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The stopper for a _potion of expeditious retreat_ is crafted to easily snap open in dire circumstances. When you drink this potion, you become [fleeing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=17) for 1 minute, and you gain a +40-foot status bonus to all your Speeds for the duration as long as you are fleeing. You immediately Stride.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Potion of Expeditious Retreat
